Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.strategies

Class HardcoreMoveStrategy

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.strategies.HardcoreMoveStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
InteractionStrategy, MakeMoveStrategy
public class HardcoreMoveStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements MakeMoveStrategy
Hardcore strategy for moving on the board. No suggestion supplied, and player loses violating card's must rules.
